## Accommodation

[Booking.com](https://booking.com) is degraded in Turkey. [Locations in Turkey are not available for Booking from inside the country](https://www.bing.com/ck/a?!&&p=de52ba2238b10b20JmltdHM9MTcyMTc3OTIwMCZpZ3VpZD0yZTIxMDNiZC04ODRhLTY5NmYtMTU3MC0xMGZjODk2MjY4YWMmaW5zaWQ9NTQxMw&ptn=3&ver=2&hsh=3&fclid=2e2103bd-884a-696f-1570-10fc896268ac&psq=booking.com+blocked+in+turkey&&ntb=1). Some travelers on Facebook report bypassing the restriction is trivial using VPN.
